########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

include_directories(${Boost_INCLUDE_DIR} ${IIO_INCLUDE_DIRS})
link_directories(${Boost_LIBRARY_DIRS})

add_library(gnuradio-hnchiio SHARED
	eightbit_sink_impl.cc
	eightbit_source_impl.cc
	thirtytwobit_sink_impl.cc
	thirtytwobit_source_impl.cc
	flexi_source_impl.cc
	hnchbbboard_source_impl.cc
	hnchboard2_source_impl.cc
	hnchboard2u_source_impl.cc
	multi_source_impl.cc
	device_source_impl.cc
	device_sink_impl.cc
)
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-hnchiio
	PUBLIC gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime
	PRIVATE gnuradio::gnuradio-blocks libiio::iio Volk::volk
	)
target_include_directories(gnuradio-hnchiio
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )


########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-hnchiio)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")
